title: maxnoofconcurrentoperations error during upgrade from oc 4.5.13 -> oc 5.0.11
body:
i'm in the process of testing an upgrade from oc 4.5.13 -> oc 5.0.11.  during the process, i received the following error message:

sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 1297 got temporary error 233 'out of operation records in transaction coordinator (increase maxnoofconcurrentoperations)' from ndbcluster

the update was unsuccessful. please report this issue to the owncloud community.

i believe the default setting for maxnoofconcurrentoperations is 32768, which seems pretty large.  i'm going to bump it up to 100000 and retry the upgrade.  currently this mysql cluster only has our production owncloud database, the test owncloud database, and and idle test database so i wouldn't think the strain on the system is too large.  i'll update this once i've had a chance to try the upgrade again after increasing the setting.
